lines.text:
[to Ferguson]
Then I'll fix you up a date with a redhead.
That's the trouble with being in love. It kills your sex life.

[Walking into the hospital library]
Hey, does anyone got anything to eat? A chocolate bar or anything? I'm hungry.

[Cynically]
Slop! Live the life of a fireman and eat slop! All we need is a pole to slide down.
You're right. you've always been right, you and Hochy. It's bigger than any of us... humanity!

[Cynically]
You know, I was in love once.

[Sarcastically]
That's the thing I like about you, Pete - your romantic nature.
You work very hard, don't you?
Work? Sure! What else is thee but work and work?
